A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It’s a movie about failure and war. It’s unpredictable and undeniably one of my favorites. I don’t understand the hate towards this movie. It pays homage to the two previous trilogies and turns an unexpected corner developing a truly great villain. If you are mad about the purple haired admiral not telling Poe her plan. That’s because he was untrustworthy and went behind her back and made things worse. He learns his lesson in the end. 2nd best Star Wars flick!
